name: Blockpop Heroes
description:
Blockpop heroes is a minimalist fun runner, based primarily on jumps rather than distance, which parodies pop culture heroes through the appearance of "blocks" and a simple and wacky story.

  • Quick and easy gameplay, no hassle!

  • Jump and jump again to unlock over 50 characters!

  • Each jump makes a random sound from over 20 possible intonations, each level will have a different composition!

  • Original boss fights!
